text:
@realDonaldTrump @LouDobbs @realDonaldTrump says:

#coronavirus "is not my fault! It's @BarackObama 's fault! And both President Bush's! And FDR did NOTHING to stop coronavirus! JFK was fooling around with the Cuban missile crisis and did ZERO to stop this virus! The buck stops with those losers, not me!"
